thread.title: BRIEF-Energy Recovery Announces Share Repurchase Program

title: BRIEF-Energy Recovery Announces Share Repurchase Program
text: March 8, 2018 / 2:01 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Energy Recovery Announces Share Repurchase Program Reuters Staff March 8 (Reuters) - Energy Recovery Inc: * ENERGY RECOVERY ANNOUNCES SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM * ENERGY RECOVERY INC - APPROVED A SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM THAT AUTHORIZES COMPANY TO PURCHASE UP TO $10 MILLION OF COMPANY’S OUTSTANDING COMMON STOCK. * ENERGY RECOVERY INC - PAYMENT FOR SHARES REPURCHASED UNDER PROGRAM WILL BE FUNDED USING COMPANY’S CASH ON HAND Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
